thread.title: Newswire: Lady Gaga salutes America in her Super Bowl halftime show performance
thread.title_full: Newswire: Lady Gaga salutes America in her Super Bowl halftime show performance

author: Sam Barsanti
title: Newswire: Lady Gaga salutes America in her Super Bowl halftime show performance
text:
Share Tweet 
Though it didn’t have the meme-friendly antics of a dancing shark, the unexpected nudity, or the unnecessary Coldplay-ness of some previous Super Bowl halftime shows, this year’s Lady Gaga performance was predictably Gaga-esque. It started with a weird performance of “America The Beautiful” with Gaga standing on the stadium’s roof while stars formed a flag behind her, and then Gaga descended down from the sky and jumped into the typical Halftime Show medley of hits. Also, other than putting on a sparkly jacket thing and grabbing a keytar for “Just Dance,” there weren’t as many ridiculous Gaga outfits as you might expect. At the very least, a dress made out of literal pigskins would’ve been fun for football’s biggest night. 
You can see video of Gaga’s performance below.
